title: [Medicine] Scientists have developed a CRISPR-Cas13 gene editing therapy against the RNA virus that causes hand, foot, and mouth disease, eliminating the virus in mouse models. The EV-A71 virus in severe cases can lead to nervous system disease and death.

[Neuroscience] Researchers have modified a commercial Meta VR headset by installing a noninvasive EEG sensor that can be worn comfortably for long periods, giving it the ability to measure brain activity and examine how we react to hints, stressors and other outside forces during the immersive VR interactions
